Uses of Interface
org.cojen.tupl.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    org.cojen.tupl
    See Database to get started with Tupl.
    org.cojen.tupl.ext
    Support for database extensions.

    • Uses of Database in org.cojen.tupl

      Methods in org.cojen.tupl that return Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Database Database.destroy(DatabaseConfig config)
      Delete the contents of an existing database, and replace it with an empty one.
      static Database Database.open(DatabaseConfig config)
      Open a database, creating it if necessary.
      static Database Database.restoreFromSnapshot(DatabaseConfig config, InputStream in)
      Restore from a snapshot, into the data files defined by the given configuration.

    • Uses of Database in org.cojen.tupl.ext

      Methods in org.cojen.tupl.ext with parameters of type Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void TransactionHandler.checkpointFinish(Database db, Object obj)
      Wait for a concurrent checkpoint to finish.
      default Object TransactionHandler.checkpointStart(Database db)
      Called to durably write all changes.
      void TransactionHandler.redo(Database db, Transaction txn, byte[] message)
      Non-transactionally apply an idempotent redo operation.
      void TransactionHandler.redo(Database db, Transaction txn, byte[] message, long indexId, byte[] key)
      Non-transactionally apply an idempotent redo operation.
      default void TransactionHandler.setCheckpointLock(Database db, Lock lock)
      Called once when the database is opened, providing a shared lock which is later acquired exclusively by checkpoints.
      void TransactionHandler.undo(Database db, byte[] message)
      Non-transactionally apply an idempotent undo operation.
